Game Release Date : March 15. 2005 (Box Retail)
Game Type         : Racing
Protection        : StarForce 3X
Developer(s) 	  : SimBin 
Publisher(s)      : Atari (WIN)
                    THQ (Xbox 360) 
Engine            : Customised ISI engine 
Platform(s)       : Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360, & Windows 7 
Release date(s)   : March 11, 2005 (WIN)
		  : TBA (Xbox 360) 
Genre(s)          : Racing, Simulator 
Mode(s) 	  : Single player, Multiplayer 
Rating(s) ESRB    : E (Everyone)
USK               : Free for all
PEGI              : 3+
OFLC              : G 
Media             : 2 CD-ROMs, DVD 
SystemRequirements: 1.2 GHz CPU, 384 MB RAM, 32 MB video card RAM,
		    4X CD-ROM drive, DirectX 8.1,
                    1024 MB available hard disk space, Windows Me 
Input methods     : Steering wheel, TrackIR 




[Teams]
A list over the various teams available for the user with links to the road legal versions of the cars.

Ferrari 550 Teams
Ferrari 575 Teams
Chrysler Viper Teams
Lister Storm Teams
Lamborghini Teams
Saleen S7-R Teams
Corvette C5-R Teams
Porsche 993 GT2 Teams
Ferrari 360 Teams
Porsche 996 GT3 Teams
Morgan Aero 8 Teams
Mosler MT900R Teams
SEAT Toledo GT Teams
BMW Z3 M Teams
Lotus Elise Teams

[edit] Modifications and add-ons
The user community has developed several completely new cars and tracks for the game, including some total conversions (to e.g. Formula One). Simbin has also released an "add-on pack" called "Kings of Ovals" which contains a set of new oval-style tracks


[Install] : Open CRACK.zip for Any Details.
